  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_441</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_441</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Las matemáticas que hay en un sobre</string>
            <string language="en">Envelopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umschläge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enveloppes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Envelopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Buste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάκελοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones diferentes conceptos geométricos tomando como modelo un sobre de cartas. Se estudian las propiedades de paralelogramos y cuadriláteros en general.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain different geometrical concepts related to an envelope. The different properties of parallelograms and other types of quadrilaterals are studied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">diagonales</string>
            <string language="en">diagonal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">paralelogramo</string>
            <string language="en">parallelogram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrilátero</string>
            <string language="en">quadrilateral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sobre</string>
            <string language="en">envelope</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, unterschiedliche geometrische Konzepte zu 
erklären auf einem Umschlag in Verbindung stand. Die 
unterschiedlichen Eigenschaften von Parallelogrammen und von anderen 
Typen Vierecke werden studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations expliquer différents concepts géométriques a 
associées à une enveloppe. Les différentes propriétés des 
parallélogrammes et d'autres types de quadrilatères sont étudiées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
explicar conceitos geométricos diferentes relacionou a um envelope. 
As propriedades diferentes dos paralelogramos e dos outros tipos
de quadrilaterals são estudadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
spiegare i concetti geometrici differenti ha collegato ad una busta. 
Le proprietà differenti dei parallelogrammi e di altri tipi di 
quadrilaterals sono studiate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εξηγήσει τις διαφορετικές γεωμετρικές 
έννοιες αφορούσε έναν φάκελο. Οι διαφορετικές ιδιότητες 
των παραλληλογράμμων και άλλοι τύποι quadrilaterals μελετώνται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">diagonal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parallelogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umschlag</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
